mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, name, description, url, pid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, name, description, url, pid from sys_permission

select p.* from Sys_User u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on u.id= sru.Sys_User_id LEFT JOIN Sys_Role r on sru.Sys_Role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission_role spr on spr.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission p on p.id =spr.permission_id where u.id=#{userId}
